com.app.towerDefense.models

Class TowerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.towerDefense.models.TowerModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TowerModel1, TowerModel2, TowerModel3, TowerModel4, TowerModel5

    public class TowerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a generic class for Towers to make the other Towers.
    Author:
    George Ekow-Daniels
